articles.title: Chip shortage puts brakes on July auto production - NHK WORLD
articles.description: Most of Japan's major automakers say they produced fewer vehicles last month. They cite a global semiconductor shortage and the impact of the coronavirus in Southeast Asia as major headwinds.
articles.content:
